task.title: List Intensity
task.shortdesc: List intensity values from the Speech Analysis view.

context.p: A listing of intensity values can be obtained from the Speech Analysis view. To print intensity values use the following procedure.

step.cmd: (Optional) Make a selection in the Speech Analysis view.
From the Praat menu in the Speech Analysis view, select Intensity Listing .

step.note: Options for intensity listings can be changed through the Intensity Settings window.
step.cmd: The list of formants will be displayed in a new Buffers window for the audio segment/selection.
